The video in question was published on T: 2020, and has been viewed more than 2,200 times.
The tweet: s caption, translated from simplified Chinese to English, states that the Albanian TV station showed topless news anchors to encourage citizens to stay at home and watch television during the COVID-19 pandemic.
A reverse Google image search revealed t: 2017, by Zjarr Televizion, with the title "360° Grade - Greta, Enki, Flavia, Eliona."
Zjarr Televizion: the TV station responsible for the video, has a history of broadcasting risque news and has been previously criticized for its unconventional approach to presenting news.
